column2: i cannot believe that you didn’t tell me that we are still married
look i was going to tell you
after the birth of our first secret child
ross didn’t get the annulment we are still married
okay maybe it wasn’t my best decision
but i just couldn’t face another failed marriage
okay let me just jump in and ask at what point did you think this was a successful marriage
rach come on if you think about it it’s actually kinda funny
okay maybe it’s best not to think about it
i am shocked to my very core
phoebe i told her you already knew
ross just for my own piece of mind you’re not married to anymore of us are ya
who would leave the keys to their porsche behind
if i had a porsche i’d have the keys surgically attached to my hand
i make four bucks an hour i saved up for 350 years
hey did anybody lose their keys
joey why don’t you put them in the lost and found
well i didn’t realize until i got home
i wasn’t gonna walk all the way back down here with one shoe
i’m gonna go find that guy’s car and leave a note on the windshield
oh good when he comes back for his keys i’ll be sure to give him your shoe
oh good good you guys are here
listen how would like to spend tomorrow taking care of three incredibly cute little puppies
oh my god what a fun day
okay well i’ll bring them by tomorrow morning
okay and uh by the way they’re not actually puppies they’re frank and alice’s triplets
frank and alice asked me to baby sit the triplets and i’m nervous ‘cause i’ve never done that before by myself
don’t worry about it phoebe we’ll absolutely do it
‘cause i was kinda iffy when it was puppies
it’ll give us great practice for when people with babies come to visit
do uh do you like leather seats
so i still have boxes here
i still have boxes at ross’s and i have nowhere to live
i could so easily freak out right now
i just found out that denise is leaving town for a while i don’t have a roommate
well maybe maybe i could be your roommate pheebs
maybe you could be my roommate
wait how long is denise gone for
umm she said she’d be back december 26th
december 26th huh maybe she’s santa clause
oh look who it is my husband
okay i got us a court date for tomorrow at 2 00 and i picked up all the forms
well sure if you say you’re gonna take care of everything i have no reason to doubt you
all right now i’m gonna do this my way and i don’t want to hear a peep out of you
y’know what i just got why
i don’t wanna hear three failed marriages
look if you’d had two failed marriages you’d understand
thanks to you i’m half way there
ross i don’t think i have ever been this angry
what about the time i said we were on a break
do you think they’re having fun
look at chandler with little baby girl chandler
little baby girl chandler where i have heard that before
when you’re done over there we kinda have a situation over here too
na uh no we are all responsible for our own babies
see that’s where i think that you’re wrong
we’ve been playing these babies man for man we should really be playing a zone defense
i just think that things would go a lot smoother if we each have our own zone
phoebe you can be in charge of wiping
and y’know mon you can be in charge of diapering and i can be in charge of looking how cute they are when they put their hands around…
that sounds really great but maybe you should be in charge of wiping
i should not be in the end zone
this is exactly how we set the plates at the restaurant
well this is not what i ordered
oh i’m having the best morning
that uh that porsche i’ve got the keys too still there
since you still have the keys
you should see the treatment i get when i’m with that car
people are friendly they they wanna talk and not just about the car
one guy gave me advice about my equity investments
the ones that got me the porsche
but i figured if if people keep seeing me just standing there they’re gonna start to think that i don’t own it
so i figured i’ll wash it
monica you got a bucket and some soap i can borrow
oh yeah i got soap and sponges and rags and carnuba wax and polishing compound
you don’t even have a car
but umm one time there was this really dirty car in front of the building so i washed it
and that’s just in the city
i get her up to 160 when i take her upstate
oh uh oh just give me five more minutes with it
oh i i uh found the keys and now i’m just polishing her up
listen i i i don’t come to this city much so i don’t know if you’re crazy or this is some kind of street theater but could i have my keys
i’ll uh save your parking spot
i don’t know why i was so nervous about this
and i don’t know why frank and alice are always complaining
yeah two hours a lifetime that’s the same
when the babies wake up they can meet krog
that thing can put someone’s eye out
he can do more than that
no chandler they can swallow one of those little parts
and also look at his smooth area that’s just gonna mess them up
they’re not gonna swallow anything you guys are being way over protective
when i was a kid my mom used to just throw me into a pile of broken glass
oh look at little leslie stretching in her sleep
i wonder what age it is when you stop being able to put both legs over your head
oh i can still do that
i thought about it and maybe you’re right
maybe krog is not a safe toy
what made you change your mind
i swallowed the sonic blaster gun
well i was trying to prove that i was right
and it turns out i was wrong
and now it’s lodged in my throat
y’know this whole time we were concentrating on watching the babies and and no one was watching chandler
okay you two are asking the court for an annulment
yes your honor and here are are forms all filled out
so based on your petition you are seeking an annulment on the grounds that mr
and based on the fact that mr
crack isn’t even an intravenous drug
now it also says here that you lied about your sexual preference before marriage
ross please i found the magazines
and finally that you were unable to consummate the marriage
well that makes sense since you’re gay and addicted to heroin
okay i’m sorry this is insane
i i i’m not addicted to heroin i’m not gay and there is no problem with my ability to consummate anything
look i’ll consummate this marriage right here right now
and when we were dating we consummated like bunnies
now if you were two involved in a serious relationship that really creates a problem
your honor rest assured relationship ended like two years ago
and could you strike consummated like bunnies from the record
is there anything in this record that is actually true
well yes we got married in vegas and uh and the names i think
well based on what i heard you two certainly don’t qualify for an annulment
if you two don’t want to be together you’ll have to file for divorce
look what you did with your funny funny form
what about you and your consummated like bunnies nonsense
and what what are you typing that for
did you hear what she said
okay do you see do you see what you’re keeping me married too
you need to get out of my chambers
all right look lady here is the deal i came here for an annulment and i am not leaving here until i get one
would you like to spend the night in jail
and thank you for your time
so the porsche guy took his car back
but you found the keys to his clothes
no i just uh i just loved the way it feels when everybody thinks i own a porsche
and people will think you own a porsche because you’re wearing the clothes
only an idiot would wear this stuff if you didn’t have the car
yeah but only a genius would swallow a sonic blaster gun
yeah i am gonna go drive my porsche
joey you know you don’t actually have one
ahh i think it just moved
all right that’s it we’re going to the emergency room
no you can’t you can’t leave me here with them
the babies are asleep i’m sure you’ll be okay on your own for a while
but you you can’t leave me with them
he’s got something plastic lodged in his throat we’ve got to go to the hospital
but no because a doctor won’t be able to help him it’s just gonna y’know naturally pass through his system in like seven years
a real man wouldn’t just run to the hospital
what would what would krog do
why isn’t that valet back with my porsche
maybe because you’ve got the keys
well you ripped the paper out of the court reporter’s machine
that was the only way i could get him to stop typing
the judge wouldn’t let us get an annulment
now we gotta get a divorce
did a porsch throw up on you
me taking care of you is no problem huh
okay i’m gonna take that spit bubble as yeah i do
okay after i get rid of this dirty diaper leslie i’ll set you up with a clean one
i didn’t mean to scare you
i just have to clean that up
‘cause let’s face it we’re at monica’s
well that’s just the way that goes
why are there only two of you
leslie now would be a good time for your first words
you are a little bit mischievous
okay you sit with your brother and sister now who aren’t there
well let’s just say that krog will be fully equipped to destroy the universe again in twelve to fourteen hours
okay so i totally took care of the babies all by myself
i fed ‘em bathed ‘em and put ‘em to bed
and protected them from a tornado
i know the babies are asleep
i took care of the babies all by myself
was the setting of phoebe’s triumph
is not as important as the fact that phoebe took care of the babies all by herself
you’re right you’re right i shouldn’t freak out
‘cause this is what will happen when you and i have babies
phoebe would you take a look at this mess
oh honey thank god you’re home i was getting worried
i picked up the divorce papers
uh i’ve already signed everything and i put little ‘x’s where you need to sign
y’know i i you’ve done a lot of stupid stuff too
oh name one stupid thing that is as stupid as this one
okay how about you flew to london to stop my wedding
ah how about you told me you loved me after i was already married
i did those things because i was in love with you
so let’s let’s just sign the papers
okay can we just sign please
okay ross we’re wait a minute
umm i uh i kinda have a little confession
well y’know this whole marriage thing kinda my idea
well remember how we were too drunk to remember anything the night we were married

and uh yeah i didn’t really i didn’t want to say anything but it kinda it just it kinda kept coming back to me and umm remember we were in the casino and for some reason thought it would be funny to eat a lot of grapes
and uh and i thought it would be funnier if we got married
so as a as a compromise we decided first to get married and then to eat a lot of grapes
so umm sorry i got us into this mess
so then if if i mean if you think about it this is all your fault
i’ve got to say i know i divorce a lot of women never thought i would be divorcing you
i always thought if you and i got married it would be the one that stuck
and it wouldn’t be a secret and we wouldn’t have our wedding dinner at pizza hut
did i did i even treat
no it was on the house it was it was a newlywed special
that may be the most depressing thing i’ve heard in my life
i should probably get these to my lawyer’s office
hey thanks ross for taking care of all of this
i’m gonna need a copy of those
he has the most amazing porsche under there
i’d love to show ya but i just tucked her in
hey uh would you two girls like to go for a drink
